name: games_by_platform_category_sorted
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool free_to_play_games_database.
Tool description: Free-to-play games database powered by FreeToGame.com!
API description: Fetches and returns a list of games filtered by platform and category, and sorted based on a given parameter.

category.description: The category to filter games by. Defaults to 'mmorpg'.

platform.description: The platform to filter games by. Defaults to 'browser'.

sort_by.description: Criterion to sort the games by. Defaults to 'release-date'.
